EmailTemplate.name: CA - Off Waitlist
EmailTemplate.subject: You're off the waitlist!
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {!Receiving_User.FirstName},
We're so happy you're a BlueWaver.
Thanks for choosing BlueWave as your community solar provider. We wanted to reach out and welcome you to BlueWave.
Our brighter energy future starts with you.
Speaking of the future, we wanted to let you know what you can expect from us going forward:
Access to your BlueWave Member Portal Stay tuned, in the upcoming weeks you will receive an email giving you access to your BlueWave Member Portal
Community Solar Referral Program Once you receive access to your BlueWave Community Member Portal you'll be able to refer your neighbors, family, and friends and get $100 for doing so.
More detials will be included in your portal activation email.
And just you wait. This is only the beginning of your BlueWaver benefits!
We'll continue to be in touch with billing and account notifications, important project updates, special offers, and cool stories.
- All of us here at BlueWave
BlueWave Solar 111 Huntington Ave, Suite 650 Boston, MA 02199
Questions or concerns about solar? Call us at 844.768.4100 Email us at customercare@bluewavesolar.com
